theAbandoned:BounceStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next theabandoned:Initiative card played this turn triggers it's effect.

theAbandoned:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger an theabandoned:Initiative effect, draw !M! card.
